firstNightReminder: Replace the Acolyte's character token with a not-in-play Minion token and mark it with the 'Is the Acolyte' reminder token (that player is still the good Acolyte). When this Minion would normally act, the relevant choices are made by the Demon.
name: Acolyte
ability: The Demon has a not-in-play Minion ability.
flavor: I wish only to serve.

otherNightReminder: If the Adventurer completed their adventure: Write down a piece of information or advice, wake the Adventurer and give it to them.
name: Adventurer
ability: On your 1st night, the Storyteller sends you on an adventure. If you complete the adventure, you receive a piece of advice or information from the Storyteller that night.
flavor: Adventure time! Come on, grab your friends. We'll go to very distant lands.

firstNightReminder: The Albatross either shows the 'no' head signal, or points to a living player. Mark that player with the 'Doomed' reminder.
otherNightReminder: If no player is marked with the 'Doomed' reminder: The Albatross either shows the 'no' head signal, or points to a living player. Mark that player with the 'Doomed' reminder. Choose a player. That player dies.
name: Albatross
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a living player: if they die by execution, their team loses. A player dies each night*.
flavor: Since then, at an uncertain hour, that agony returns; and till my ghastly tale is told, this heart within me burns.

firstNightReminder: The Baker points to a player. Mark that player with the 'Baked' reminder.
otherNightReminder: Remove any 'Baked' reminders. The Baker points to a player. Mark that player with the 'Baked' reminder.
name: Baker
ability: Each night, choose a player: they get true information tonight and tomorrow day.
flavor: The hunger for love is much more difficult to remove than the hunger for bread.

otherNightReminder: If the Barby was nominated today: The Barby points to a player. That player is poisoned.
name: Barby
ability: Each night*, if you were nominated today, choose a player: they are poisoned for the rest of the game.
flavor: An itch must be scratched.

firstNightReminder: Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) of players who woke up tonight (including the Bellhop).
otherNightReminder: Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) of players who woke up tonight (including the Bellhop).
name: Bellhop
ability: Each night, you learn how many players woke up.
flavor: At your service!

otherNightReminder: If all Minions are dead: Wake a good player and show them the Blacksmith's character token.
name: Blacksmith
ability: If all Minions are dead, tonight a good player learns you are in play.
flavor: Can I get you anything?.

otherNightReminder: The Bloodletter points to a player. That player dies. If that player is a Minion, mark that player with the 'Dead' and '+1 attack' reminders (that player is the only player to die tonight). Otherwise, allow the Bloodletter to point to and kill an additonal player for each '+1 attack' reminder in play.
name: Bloodletter
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. For each Minion killed this way, you may choose an additional player each night (a chosen Minion is the only player to die tonight).
flavor: Your sacrifice shan't be in vain...

otherNightReminder: The Candyman points to a player. That player dies.
name: Candyman
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you are nominated & not executed 3 times, evil wins.
flavor: I am the writing on the wall, the whisper in the classroom. Without these things, I am nothing.

firstNightReminder: The Charlatan either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a player. If the Charlatan used their ability: mark that player with the
otherNightReminder: The Charlatan points to 1 or 2 players. The first player dies. Mark the second player with the 'Bounces execution' reminder.
name: Charlatan
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Once per game, at night, choose a player: the first time they are executed, another player dies instead.
flavor: The simplest truth is more powerful than even the most elaborate lie.

otherNightReminder: If no living player was executed today: The Cheesemonger points to player. That player dies.
name: Cheesemonger
ability: Each night*, if no living player was executed today, choose a player: they die.
flavor: I am the cheese.

otherNightReminder: If the Clerk was executed today, show the character token of the player that nominated them.
name: Clerk
ability: If you are executed, tonight you learn who nominated you.
flavor: There were some discrepancies in the financial statements.

otherNightReminder: If no player targeted the Crybaby with their ability tonight: The Crybaby dies.
name: Crybaby
ability: Each night*, if you are not targeted by another player with their ability, you die.
flavor: I'm not addicted to attention. Anyway, listen to this...

firstNightReminder: Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) of Outsiders sat next to an evil player.
name: Customs Officer
ability: You start knowing how many Outsiders are neighbouring evil players. [+1 Outsider]
flavor: Have you filled in th proper forms?

name: Discord
ability: 2 Townsfolk players think they are each other's characters.
flavor: What we imagine is order is merely the prevailing form of chaos.

name: Draggletail
ability: Your 2 alive Townsfolk neighbours are poisoned.
flavor: It's not easy being cheesy.

firstNightReminder: Show the character tokens of a Minion and a Demon that are not in play.
name: Entomologist
ability: You start knowing 1 Minion & 1 Demon that are not in play.
flavor: The wings of transformation are born of patience and struggle.

firstNightReminder: Show the character tokens of all Minions in play.
name: Exterminator
ability: You start knowing which Minions are in play.
flavor: Don't knock the power of a pest. Persistence and stubbornness can be useful in many situations.

otherNightReminder: The Fowel points to a player. That player dies.
name: Fowel
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Players that target you with their ability become poisoned until the next night.
flavor: My pleasure.

otherNightReminder: The previously poisoned players are no longer poisoned. The Gerrymander points to a player. That player dies. Townsfolk players that nominated that player or were nominated by that player today are now poisoned.
name: Gerrymander
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Townsfolk players that nominated them or were nominated by them today are poisoned tonight and tomorrow day.
flavor: Every election is determined by those who show up.

otherNightReminder: If the Giller was executed today: One of the Giller's alive neighbours dies.
name: Giller
ability: If you are executed, 1 of your alive neighbours dies tonight.
flavor: There's always a bigger fish.

firstNightReminder: Choose a player that is drunk.
otherNightReminder: Choose a player that is drunk.
name: Glazier
ability: Each night, a player is drunk tonight and tomorrow day, even if you are dead.
flavor: People are like stained-glass windows. They sparkle and shine when the sun is out, but when the darkness sets in, their true beauty is revealed only if there is a light from within.

firstNightReminder: Choose a living Minion who would act tonight. Have them carry out their action a second time immediately after their first action tonight.
otherNightReminder: Choose a living Minion who would act tonight. Have them carry out their action a second time immediately after their first action tonight.
name: Glutton
ability: Each night, a Minion acts twice, even if you are dead.
flavor: I think I'll have another.

name: Grave Robber
ability: Ghost votes don't count.
flavor: Everyone looks the same when they're dead. We're all equal then. So when I meet a chap, sitting on his high horse, I imagine him dead. He's not quite so intimidating then.

otherNightReminder: If the Hoarder was executed today: All players marked with the 'Learned' reminder die. Otherwise: Wake the Demon. Point to a player and show their character token. Mark that player with the 'Learned' reminder.
name: Hoarder
ability: Each night, the Demon learns a good player & their character. If you are executed, each of these players dies that night.
flavor: These are my things! I need them!

firstNightReminder: Write down a piece of information or advice, wake the Insider and give it to them.
otherNightReminder: Write down a piece of information or advice, wake the Insider and give it to them.
name: Insider
ability: Each night, you receive a piece of information or advice from the storyteller.
flavor: Every man is surrounded by a neighbourhood of voluntary spies.

otherNightReminder: If a player the Instigator nominated today was executed: The Instigator points to a player. That player dies.
name: Instigator
ability: Each night*, if a player you nominated today was executed, choose a player: they die.
flavor: Let's get it started in here.

otherNightReminder: If the Demon is marked with the 'Accused' reminder: The J'Accuse dies.
name: J'Accuse
ability: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a player: if they are the Demon, you die that night.
flavor: I have but one passion: to enlighten those who have been kept in the dark, in the name of humanity which has suffered so much and is entitled to happiness. My fiery protest is simpy the cry of my very soul.

otherNightReminder: If the Jailbird died today or tonight: You may decide to kill 1 of the Jailbird's living neighbours. If 1 of the Jailbird's living neighbours died today or tonight: You may decide to kill the Jailbird.
name: Jailbird
ability: If either of your living neighbours die, you might die tonight. If you die, 1 of your living neighbours might die tonight.
flavor: To forgive is to set a prisoner free and discover that the prisoner was you.

otherNightReminder: If a player targeted the Leper with their ability today or tonight: You may decide to kill a good player.
name: Leper
ability: If a player targets you with their ability, a good player might die that night, even if you are dead.
flavor: The worst disease is the feeling of being unwanted.

otherNightReminder: The Lobo points to a player. That player dies.
name: Lobo
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. You might register as good & as a Townsfolk or Outsider, even if dead.
flavor: The greatest trick the devil ever played was convincing the world that he did not exist.

otherNightReminder: The previously protected players are no longer protected. The Martyr points to two players. Mark those players with the 'Protected' reminder.
name: Martyr
ability: Each night*, choose 2 players: if the Demon kills either tonight, you die instead.
flavor: My sacrifice shan't be in vain...

otherNightReminder: Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) for the number of players that nominated a player of different alignment today.
name: Messenger
ability: Each night*, you learn how many players nominated a player of different alignment.
flavor: Saying nothing is also saying something.

otherNightReminder: The Mind Flayer points to a player. That player dies. Show the Mind Flayer that player's character token. The Mind Flayer either nods their head yes or shakes their head no. If they nod their head yes: Move the 'Has ability' reminder to that player.
name: Mind Flayer
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If a living player dies this way, you learn their character & may choose to gain their ability. You may only have 1 additional ability at a time.
flavor: I'm sure if we bashed your head in, all sorts of secrets would come tumbling out...

firstNightReminder: Wake any Mitosis. Show the 'This is the Demon' card, and point to all other Mitosis. Put that Mitosis to sleep. Repeat until all Mitosis have acted.
otherNightReminder: Wake any Mitosis. They point to a player. That player dies. Put that Mitosis to sleep. Repeat until all Mitosis have acted.
name: Mitosis
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. There are 2 Mitosis in play & good must kill both to win. You know the other Mitosis. [No Minions]
flavor: Life finds a way.

otherNightReminder: Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) of deaths prevented tonight.
name: Mortician
ability: Each night*, you learn how many deaths were prevented tonight.
flavor: The body keeps the score.

otherNightReminder: If the Demon is marked with the 'Nominated' reminder, they don't wake up tonight.
name: Mudlark
ability: The 1st time you nominate, if you nominate the Demon, they don't wake that night.
flavor: The mud will wash off but the memories will last forever.

otherNightReminder: If the Necromancer has not used their ability: The Necromancer either shakes their head no, or points to a player. That player is now alive.
name: Necromancer
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a dead player: they are resurrected. If good, they become your alignment.
flavor: Most men say they will fight until their last breath. I say let them fight a bit longer.

firstNightReminder: Mark all Minions with the 'Wakes the Night Hutner' reminder. Any time a Minion would wake up, wake the Night Hunter too.
otherNightReminder: Wake the Night Hunter and Minions. The Night Hunter points to a player. That player dies.
name: Night Hunter
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. You and your Minions always wake up together.
flavor: Afraid of the dark? I sure hope so.

otherNightReminder: If the Novelist died tonight: Wake a good player. Point to another player. Show that player's character token.
name: Novelist
ability: If you die at night, a good player learns another player's character.
flavor: A writer is someone for whom writing is more difficult than it is for other people.

otherNightReminder: If the Nunchaku has not yet used their ability: The Nunchaku either shows the 'no' head signal, or points to a player. The Nunchaku and that player die.
name: Nunchaku
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: you both die.
flavor: Cowabunga!

firstNightReminder: When the first night has ended, declare that the Omen is in play, and which player it is.
otherNightReminder: The Omen points to a player. That player dies.
name: Omen
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. All players know who you are. If any of your Minions live, you cannot die.
flavor: They're here...

name: Origamist
ability: Good players can't die at night. The 1st time a player is executed, you die instead, even if you are drunk or poisoned.
flavor: After staring at directions for long enough, you sort of become one with them and start understanding them from the inside.

name: Patsy
ability: If the Demon dies, you might die instead.
flavor: You've got the wrong guy!

firstNightReminder: If the Physician has not yet used their ability: The Physician either shows the 'no' head signal, or points to a player. That player is sober and healthy until tomorrow night.
otherNightReminder: If the Physician has not yet used their ability: The Physician either shows the 'no' head signal, or points to a player. That player is sober and healthy until tomorrow night.
name: Physician
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a player: they learn they have been chosen & are sober & healthy until tomorrow night.
flavor: Sticks and stones may break my bones (but words will hurt forever).

name: Pilgrim
ability: If you die at night, you lose your ghost vote.
flavor: Some beautiful paths can't be discovered without getting lost.

otherNightReminder: The previously poisoned players are no longer poisoned. If the Pluto points to a player, that player dies. Otherwise, all Townsfolk players are poisoned.
name: Pluto
ability: Each night*, you may choose a player: they die. If you choose no-one, all Townsfolk players are poisoned tonight and tomorrow day.
flavor: Get a good idea, and stay with it. Dog it, and work at it until it's done and done right.

firstNightReminder: The Poppet points to a character. If that character is in play, they are poisoned.
otherNightReminder: The previously poisoned player is no longer poisoned. The Poppet points to a character. If that character is in play, they are poisoned.
name: Poppet
ability: Each night, choose a character: if in play, they are poisoned tonight and tomorrow day.
flavor: I say a little prayer for you.

firstNightReminder: Show the 'This is the Demon' card. Point to the Demon.
name: Prophet
ability: You start knowing the Demon. If you are 'mad' that that player is evil or that you are the Prophet, your team loses, even if you are dead.
flavor: A vision that was planted in my brain still remains...

otherNightReminder: The Protoss points to a player. Mark them with the 'Dead' and 'Drunk' reminders.
name: Protoss
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die, but do not learn this (they are drunk & have 1 vote for the remainder of the game).
flavor: Your thoughts betray you.

name: Provost
ability: The 1st time you nominate, the nominee's execution does not end the day.
flavor: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose.

firstNightReminder: Wake the evil player marked with the 'Knows' reminder. Show the 'This character selected you' card, then the Prune token. Point to townsfolk who is evil and show the thumbs down evil sign.
name: Prune
ability: There is an evil Townsfolk player who thinks they are good. An evil player knows who it is. [1 Townsfolk is evil]
flavor: Some do the wrong thing right reason.

name: Revenant
ability: You may nominate even if dead & regain your ghost vote after each use.
flavor: As long as you can still grab a breath, you fight. You breathe. Keep breathing. When there is a storm and you stand in front of a tree, if you look at its branches, you swear it will fall. But if you watch the trunk, you will see its stability.

firstNightReminder: The Scourge either points to two players or signals decapitation. If the Scourge points to two players: Mark each of those players with the 'Marked' reminder. If the Scourge signals decapitation: Each player with a 'Marked' reminder dies.
otherNightReminder: The Scourge either points to two players or signals decapitation. If the Scourge points to two players: Mark each of those players with the 'Marked' reminder. If the Scourge signals decapitation: Each player with a 'Marked' reminder dies.
name: Scourge
ability: Each night, choose to mark 2 players or kill all marked players (players die in the order in which they were marked).
flavor: Some stains don't wash off.

otherNightReminder: Point to a player marked with the 'Chosen' reminder. Show that player's character token.
name: Scribe
ability: Each night*, you learn 1 player chosen by the Demon. (Or that no one was chosen.)
flavor: To write is to be eternal, omnipresent.

firstNightReminder: The Shar points to a player. Mark that player with the 'Chosen' reminder.
otherNightReminder: The Shar points to a player. Mark that player with the 'Chosen' reminder.
name: Shar
ability: Each night, choose a player: if they receive enough votes to be executed at any point tomorrow, they are executed at dusk.
flavor: Destiny will not be cheated.

firstNightReminder: Mark one of the Sheriff's Townsfolk neighbours with the 'Drunk' reminder.
name: Sheriff
ability: 1 of your Townsfolk neighbours is drunk. Your Townsfolk neighbours cannot be killed by the Demon.
flavor: Come with me if you want to live.

name: Sherpa
ability: If a good player dies, you might die instead.
flavor: I will show you the way.

otherNightReminder: Choose zero, one, or more players to die.
name: Shiba
ability: You think you are a Townsfolk character, but you are not. Each night, any number of players might die.
flavor: Good boy.

firstNightReminder: The Smuggler points to a player. If that player is evil: show the Smuggler the 'You are' card and the thumbs down evil sign. Mark the Smuggler with the 'No ability' reminder. Otherwise, if that player would wake tonight: Mark that player with the 'Drunk' reminder. Have the Smuggler carry out that player's action (interact with the Smuggler the same way you would that player, but don't say that player's role).
otherNightReminder: The Smuggler points to a player. If that player is evil: show the Smuggler the 'You are' card and the thumbs down evil sign. Mark the Smuggler with the 'No ability' reminder. Otherwise, if that player would wake tonight: Mark that player with the 'Drunk' reminder. Have the Smuggler carry out that player's action (interact with the Smuggler the same way you would that player, but don't say that player's role).
name: Smuggler
ability: Each night, choose a player. If they would wake tonight, they are drunk & you gain their ability until dusk. If you choose an evil player, you become evil & lose your ability.
flavor: I know how to get things.

name: Snuggler
ability: Each night, a good player is drunk until dusk. If you die, Townsfolk players don't wake up.
flavor: Fancy a cuddle?

otherNightReminder: The Sphinx points to a player. That player dies.
name: Sphinx
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you die (ending the game), publicly guess all players' characters. If you are correct, evil wins.
flavor: All is a riddle, and the key to a riddle... is another riddle.

firstNightReminder: The Spork points to 1 or 2 players. Those players are poisoned.
otherNightReminder: The previously poisoned players are no longer poisoned. The Spork points to 1 or 2 players. Those players are poisoned.
name: Spork
ability: Each night, choose 1 or 2 players: they are poisoned tonight and tomorrow day. If you choose 2, the Demon might also be poisoned tonight and tomorrow day.
flavor: Where my spores fly, I do not decide; that is up to the wind.

firstNightReminder: Show a reminder token from the Grimoire. Point to the players it applies to, or shake your head no if it applies to no one.
otherNightReminder: Show a reminder token from the Grimoire. Point to the players it applies to, or shake your head no if it applies to no one.
name: Stargazer
ability: Each night, the Storyteller shows you a reminder token and you learn which player it applies to in the Grimoire, or that it applies to no one.
flavor: Look at the stars. See their beauty. And in that beauty, see yourself.

otherNightReminder: If only 3 players live: Point to an evil player.
name: Stoic
ability: If only 3 players live, that night you learn an evil player.
flavor: Whosoever is delighted in solitude is either a wild beast or a god.

otherNightReminder: If the Templar died tonight and a Townsfolk is dead: A dead Townsfolk is now alive.
name: Templar
ability: If you die at night, a dead Townsfolk is resurrected.
flavor: I long for combat.

otherNightReminder: The Terran points to a player. That player dies.
name: Terran
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. The first time you die, you don't.
flavor: Welcome to the flying meatwagon.

firstNightReminder: The Transporter points to 2 players. Switch their seats in the Grimoire until dawn.
otherNightReminder: The Transporter points to 2 players. Switch their seats in the Grimoire until dawn.
name: Transporter
ability: Each night, choose 2 players: they switch seats until dawn, but no one learns this.
flavor: Welcome to the flying meatwagon.

otherNightReminder: Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) of true statements.
name: Tribute
ability: On your 1st day, each player may make a public statement. That night, you learn how many were true.
flavor: You'll stand before your own horn of plenty, ready to receive all that is waiting to come to you.

name: Trickster
ability: If there are 5 or more players alive & the Demon dies, you become the evil Demon, even if dead.
flavor: I am looking for the one I can't fool.

firstNightReminder: Wake a good player. Show the 'These characters are in play' card, then the Turncoat character token.
name: Turncoat
ability: There is an extra Minion in play. 1 good player knows a Turncoat is in play. [+1 Minion]
flavor: Our doubts are traitors and make us lose the good we oft might win by fearing to attempt.

firstNightReminder: Show the character tokens of 2 not-in-play characters
name: Urchin
ability: You start knowing 2 not-in-play characters.
flavor: The streets speak.

otherNightReminder: If the Demon is marked with the 'Chosen' reminder: Show the 'This character selected you' card, then the Whaler token. If the Whaler is alive and healthy when the Demon acts and a Minion has not died tonight: a Minion dies.
name: Whaler
ability: Once per game, during the day, privately visit the Storyteller & choose a player: if you choose the Demon, tonight the Demon learns this & a Minion dies.
flavor: Towards thee I roll, thou all-destroying but unconquering whale; to the last I grapple with thee; from hell's heart I stab at thee; for hate's sake I spit my last breath at thee.

otherNightReminder: If the Whisper's private statement was true: Choose a player not protected from dying tonight. That player dies.
name: Whisper
ability: Each day, you may make a statement in private to the Storyteller. Tonight, if it was true, a player dies.
flavor: The quietude: therein lie the most profound truths.

otherNightReminder: If a player is marked with the 'Lives tomorrow' reminder, replace it with the 'Alive' reminder. Otherwise, if a player is marked with the 'Dead' reminder, replace it with the 'Lives tomorrow' reminder. Otherwise, wake the Witch doctor: they either show the 'no' head signal, or point to a player. That player dies.
name: Witch Doctor
ability: Each night*, you may choose a player: they die & the night after tomorrow they are resurrected. You do not wake to choose a player unitl the previously chosen player is resurrected.
flavor: Ooh ee, ooh ah ah, ting tang, walla walla bing bang.

otherNightReminder: The Xenox points to a player. That player dies.
name: Xenox
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If all Outsiders & Minions die, evil wins. [+2 Outsiders, -1 Minion]
flavor: Collective fear stimulates herd instinct, and tends to produce ferocity toward those who are not regarded as members of the herd.

otherNightReminder: The Zerg points to a player. That player dies. Wake that player. Show the 'This character selected you' card, then Zerg token. That player either shakes their head no, or points to a player. If they point to a player, the player they pointed to dies.
name: Zerg
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die & even if dead may choose for another player to also die.
flavor: I am wretched, but I am strong. I am the future.
